channel.title: Ionutz
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ionutz" - He decided to steal all the items from the Alt Village storehouse under the assumption he was looping to a new season then left the village

item.title: Re: Ionutz
item.content:encoded: You know you should get revenge.Keep him bingo'd all times,helpful for those going for trade and notice all village leaders about what he did.You might also want to report him.Though you shoulda said something once you saw he was taking so many things lol.

item.title: Re: Ionutz
item.content:encoded: Ha ha ha yes that was not very kind…..

item.title: Re: Ionutz
item.content:encoded:
lol

I just gave him the storehouse rights yesterday. He only took what he deposited… anyway I had been rubbed by someone just one or two weeks ago so there weren't to many things to take. Someone from the village noticed this post today and took his rights. We won't have any in the future if he doesn't find a really good excuse for what he did to you.

Thanks for the info.

item.title: Re: Ionutz
item.content:encoded: anyway right now he is "about to loop" again

item.title: Re: Ionutz
item.content:encoded: He will try again to do that in Iglu, but he will be in for a big surprise.

item.title: Re: Ionutz
item.content:encoded: looping he wanted to deposit his extra items from the shop -.-

item.title: Re: Ionutz
item.content:encoded: Why did you let him have so much item permission?

item.title: Re: Ionutz
item.content:encoded: Damn dude it sucks for you….and the village wow…….

item.title: Ionutz
item.content:encoded:
He decided to steal all the items from the Alt Village storehouse under the assumption he was looping to a new season then left the village. He took a huge amount of items. I would like any and all help to keep him permanently bingo'ed and out of any village if possible.

  1. Storehouse 5/27 (Tue - 10:00): ionutz took 1 Heck Butterfly from the village.
